commitMessage: @@@Change RoutingTableProvider to support direct aggregating routing information from CurrentStates in each liveinstance. When sourceDataType is set as CurrentState.  RoutingTableProvider will listen on CurrentStateChanges and refresh routing table from CurrentStates upon changes.
@@@Properly remove clusters after each test.  and clean up duplicated codes in tests and move them into base test classes.
@@@Refactor tests to use deleteCluster in test base class to deduplicate codes.
